/wiki/Karimganj_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Karimganj Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 14 Lok Sabha constituencies in Assam state in north-eastern India . This constituency is reserved for the candidates belonging to the scheduled castes .
/wiki/Silchar_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Silchar Lok Sabha constituency ( Bengali : শিলচর লোকসভা কেন্দ্র ) is one of the 14 Lok Sabha constituencies in Assam state in north-eastern India .
/wiki/Autonomous_District_(Lok_Sabha_con: Autonomous District Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 14 Lok Sabha constituencies in the Indian state of Assam . The constituency consists of three autonomous districts namely Dima Hasao , Karbi Anglong and West Karbi Anglong district . This three districts is home to various tribal groups like Karbi , Dimasa , Kuki , Biate , Hmar , Naga Rengma etc [ citation needed ] . The constituency seat is reserved for Scheduled Tribes .
/wiki/Dhubri_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Dhubri Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 15Lok Sabha constituencies in Assam state in north-eastern India . Dhubri consists of 10 assembly segments .
/wiki/Kokrajhar_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Kokrajhar Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 14 Lok Sabha constituencies in Assam state in north-eastern India . The seat is reserved for scheduled tribes .
/wiki/Barpeta_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Barpeta Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 14 Lok Sabha constituencies in Assam state in north-eastern India .
/wiki/Gauhati_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Gauhati , also spelt Guwahati , is a Lok Sabha constituency in Assam .
/wiki/Mangaldoi_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Mangaldai is a Lok Sabha constituency in Assam .
/wiki/Tezpur_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Tezpur is a Lok Sabha constituency in Assam under the Sonitpur District .
/wiki/Nowgong_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Nagaon is a Lok Sabha constituency in Assam .
/wiki/Kaliabor_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Kaliabor Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 14 Lok Sabha constituencies in Assam state in north-eastern India .
/wiki/Jorhat_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Jorhat Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 14 Lok Sabha constituencies in Assam state in north-eastern India .
/wiki/Dibrugarh_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Dibrugarh Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 14 Lok Sabha constituencies in Assam state in north-eastern India .
/wiki/Lakhimpur_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Lakhimpur Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 14 Lok Sabha constituencies in Assam state in north-eastern India .
